page.title: 02Gidea Park Area (contd)
page.content: Gidea Park Primary is the local school and its Chairman of Governors, Cllr. Eric Munday, is the present Mayor of Havering. There are several private schools and playgroups in the area. Being so close to Romford shopping facilities are limited but the Main Road section is busy at night time because of Archers Wine Bar and Restaurant and The Ship Inn. St.Michael C.of E. Church was built in l930 and its vicar is Rev. Pilkington. This well kept building has some fine stained glass windows, the most recent was dedicated in l985 and depicts St. Cecilia. The station built in l908 is part of the Eastern Region.It is busy only on weekdays.Sport is catered for -Tennis in Gidea Close,Cricket near Gallows Corner and Golf in Heath Drive.
